A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Overall “The Last Jedi” delivered a performance leaving you wanting more. No true backstory was told for main characters\, some were vaguely disclosed and told\, but no true solid information was given. The movie was visually stunning and the humor was weaved in precise\, not to take away from what was happening onscreen. Movies sometime leave us hanging on for the next film to come afterwards\, TLJ was more\, and to an extent of leaving more questions unanswered\, and more plot goals to fill. Overall the cinematography and score were terrific and pleasing\, wished for a better story with more but not an abundance of backstory to let the audience have a more better connection with the main characters.
